backend/main.mo: Main backend actor implementing storage, authorization, product management, user profiles, digital purchases, and Stripe integration.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module converting old product records to the new schema by adding a null digitalDownload field.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, related files, components, and test IDs for digital product support and customer downloads flow.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base configuration defining CSS variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file providing the root container and loading the main frontend script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up router, layout, authentication checks, profile setup, Stripe setup modal, and theme provider.
frontend/src/components/admin/ProductDig: Provides a dialog for uploading, editing, or removing a product’s digital download file and settings.
frontend/src/components/DemoDataSeeder.t: Admin-only tool that seeds demo categories, products, hero banner, and brand story content.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Renders the site footer with branding, navigation links, categories, social icons, and a bottom bar.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Implements the site header with navigation, authentication handling, admin links, and a responsive mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal prompting the user to enter and save their name during initial profile setup.
frontend/src/components/StripeSetupModal: Shows an admin-only modal for configuring Stripe payment settings, including secret key and allowed countries.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity, refreshing dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context, managing login state, identity loading, and logout behavior.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, admin checks, homepage content, and product CRUD operations.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind setup defining light/dark vibrant color themes and utility classes for gradients and UI styling.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Initializes React app root with React Query provider and Internet Identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Static About page with story, values, and themed visuals using vibrant gradient styles.
frontend/src/pages/AdminPage.tsx: Admin dashboard enabling hero banner, brand story, product, and category management with identity and admin checks.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Contact form page with basic validation and static contact info using vibrant UI components.
frontend/src/pages/DownloadsPage.tsx: Displays a user's purchased digital products, handling login state, loading states, and linking purchases to downloadable items.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the homepage with hero content and featured products, showing skeletons while loading dynamic CMS content.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentFailurePage.ts: Shows a payment failure message with common issues and options to return to the shop or contact support.
frontend/src/pages/PaymentSuccessPage.ts: Processes successful payments by recording digital purchases, then displays confirmation and available downloads.
frontend/src/pages/ProductDetailPage.tsx: Displays detailed product info with images and purchase flow, including checkout session creation for logged‑in users.
frontend/src/pages/ShopPage.tsx: Lists products with search and category filtering, showing skeletons while loading and handling empty results.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL parameters (including hash routing), persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them from session or URL.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme, colors, breakpoints, animations, and plugins like typography, container queries, and animate.
project_state.json: Tracks project state, requirements, existing features, and pending feature requests for a digital kids-worksheets product catalog.
